content: I think, Greg, just one more thing I'd like to add to what Emanuele was saying is that, it's a case of accelerating that position where we know we are really strong, accelerating that position to where we got to now, because by adding those two ships, that ability to drop the debt down by that much, you kind of clear the watershed lines a little bit clearer, then you can just totally focus as Emanuele says, then on one thing, driving the company and driving the shareholder value.
